resources.string:
Voltage Control by xan @ xda-developers.com Tweaking utility for OC kernels for Hummbingbird based Samsung Galaxy devices. Seems to work on Galaxy S, Captivate, Epic4G, Fascinate and Vibrant. Requires proper kernel installed!!
For more info go to XDA.
You are running a incompatible kernel. To to get one head to XDA
Your device is not rooted or you have not accepted superuser prompt. To accept launch it again. More information on XDA.
Tick the frequencies you want to be used. I suggest preserving only 5-7 active states. Do not forget to set the clock limit accordingly.

This item allows you to select a way to organize an I/O (input/output) queue. Suggested: noop (simplest, less overhead) or BFQ (CFQ if not supported in kernel). Doesn\'t seem to have large impact on performance.
This item allows you to limit max clock to specific value. The processor wont run faster, even with higher states selected.
